> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

is
> still level 8 but from what I've read so far, the research seems to work
in
> a very different way. Has anybody tried research with mages and wizards?
is
> it different also?
> for necros, it's based on words ( like Word of divination ) that you need
to
> combine and for Enchanters, it seems to be based on pages of Lost Books
that
